sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using sparse matrices
message_1:
Solve the system of linear equations below using sparse matrix:

2x + 3y - 4z = 6

5x - 7y + 8z = -9

4x + 2y - 6z = 2
message_2:
To solve the system of linear equations using sparse matrix, we first need to represent the given system of equations in matrix form. The matrix form is AX = B, where A is the coefficient matrix, X is the variable matrix, and B is the constant matrix.

A = | 2  3 -4 |
    | 5 -7  8 |
    | 4  2 -6 |

X = | x |
    | y |
    | z |

B = |  6  |
    | -9  |
    |  2  |

Now, we can represent the coefficient matrix A as a sparse matrix. A sparse matrix is a matrix in which most of the elements are zero. In this case, the given matrix A is not sparse, as there are no zero elements. However, we can still solve the system of equations using the standard matrix method.

First, we find the inverse of matrix A (A_inv):

A_inv = 1/det(A) * adj(A)

where det(A) is the determinant of A, and adj(A) is the adjugate of A.

det(A) = 2(-42 + 48) - 3(20 - 32) - 4(10 + 14)
       = 2(6) - 3(-12) - 4(24)
       = 12 + 36 - 96
       = -48

adj(A) = | (-42 + 48)  (20 - 32)  (10 + 14) |
         | (24 - 48)  (8 - 12)   (4 - 10)  |
         | (14 - 28)  (4 - 6)    (2 - 10)  |

adj(A) = | 6  -12  24 |
         | -24  -4  -6 |
         | -14  -2  -8 |

Now, we can find A_inv:

A_inv = 1/(-48) * |  6  -12  24 |
                  | -24  -4  -6 |
                  | -14  -2  -8 |

A_inv = | -1/8  1/4  -1/2 |
        |  1/2  1/12  1/8 |
        |  7/24 1/24 1/6 |

Now, we can find the solution matrix X by multiplying A_inv with B:

X = A_inv * B

X = | -1/8  1/4  -1/2 |  |  6  |
    |  1/2  1/12  1/8 |  | -9  |
    |  7/24 1/24 1/6 |  |  2  |

X = | (-1/8 * 6) + (1/4 * -9) + (-1/2 * 2) |
    | (1/2 * 6) + (1/12 * -9) + (1/8 * 2)  |
    | (7/24 * 6) + (1/24 * -9) + (1/6 * 2) |

X = | -3/4 + (-9/4) -1 |
    | 3 - 3/4 + 1/4     |
    | 7/4 - 3/8 + 1/3   |

X = | -13/4 - 1 |
    |  9/4       |
    |  11/12     |

X = | -15/4 |
    |  9/4   |
    |  11/12 |

So, the solution to the system of linear equations is:

x = -15/4
y = 9/4
z = 11/12
